    A list of assignments, deadlines, and points to help you plan for the semester.
    For an overview of grading policies for this course, see XI. General Grading Rubric, located in the SYLLABUS.

    Reminder: Unless otherwise noted, assignments are always due online on GitHub at 11:59 PM the following Monday night each week!

    I. Weekly Lab Assignments

    Our schedule follows the Current MHL Academic Calendar.
    The following topics and their precise order may change. Check our Schedule page for updates!

    Week Date Points Lab Name
    1 10 Oct. 5 1.1 Commands + Navigation
    5 1.2 Download + (Un)Compress
    2 17 Oct. 5 2.1 Review
    5 2.2 Working with Files
    5 2.3 Shell Scripting, Permissions, Editing Text, Date + Time
    3 24 Oct. 15 3. Local + Remote Repositories, Creating and Saving Changes
    4 31 Oct. 5 4.1 Pull Requests + Merge Conflicts
    5 4.2 Review — Creating + Setting Up Git Repositories
    5 4.3 Review — Saving + Sending Changes to Your Repository
    5 7 Nov. 5 5.1 JavaScript Values, Types, Operations, Variables, Calling Functions, and Input/Output
    5 5.2 All the Basics… But in PYTHON!
    6 11 Nov. 5 6.1 Basic JavaScript
    5 6.2 Some Simple, Stupid Python Programs
    7 21 Nov. 5 7.1 JavaScript Conditionals
    5 7.2 Python Conditionals
    5 7.3 Nesting
    8 28 Nov. 5 8.1 JavaScript For Loops
    5 8.2 For Loops in Python
    9 5 Dec. 5 9.1 JavaScript Functions
    5 9.2 Python Functions
    10 12 Dec. 10 10.1 More info coming soon!
    11 19 Dec. 5 11.1 While Loops
    5 11.2 Recursions
    12 10 Jan. 5 12.1 HTML
    5 12.2 CSS
    5 12.3 Preparing for Your Final Assignment
    13 17 Jan. 5 13.1 Basic Canvas
    5 13.2 Advanced Canvas
    5 13.3 Animation
    14 24 Jan. 10 14.1 Advanced Web Design + GitHub Pages
    15 31 Jan. 20 15.1 Finishing Your Personal Website

    190 Total Points in Lab Assignments

    55.88% of your Course Grade

    II. Participation

    • 15 classes
    • 10 points/each

    150 Total Points in Participation Scores

    44.12% of your Course Grade

    III. Altogether, thats…

    340 Total Points for the course as a whole.
